name: moonflower
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a plant of the datura family with large white flowers that open at night: I sat out on the porch in the darkness and watched the moonflowers bloom. Moonflower is found along the banks of canals and irrigation ditches.
More examplesFewer examplesThe petals of the moonflower have a very strong scent.Several young people were admitted to hospital after eating moonflower seeds.I love to watch the opening of night-blooming flowers like evening primroses and moonflowers.Moonflowers are pollinated by nocturnal moths.
